title: AMA- Ask a Scientist Anything
body:
Howdy GD,

Midterms are next week, so naturally I am procrastinating studying. And drinking, a lot. Ask me anything you've ever wanted to know, about anything, and I will provide an answer. Probably not a good one. Unless it's about science, and then it may be better, but probably not much unless it's about my narrow focus of science.
